body: version : 1.3.6-release
Sorry,It was discovered in dev
@yeboo Can you provide a specific description or how to reproduce this problem? A `ConcurrentModificationException` exception was thrown due to another reason, I will fix the exception.
@chengshiwen What do you think ?

> @yeboo Can you provide a specific description or how to reproduce this problem? A `ConcurrentModificationException` exception was thrown due to another reason, I will fix the exception.

1. Launch a task instance that prints a large amount of business exception stack information (non-dolphinscheduler exceptions) at which point the task is running
2. Continue to launch multiple other task instances, which also print a large number of exception stack logs, and the task is committed and cannot enter a running state
3. The console outputs the above error at this time
Could you describe this feature in more detail? or do you have some docs about this feature?
@yeboo Can this problem be reproduced? Do you mean you throw a lot of exceptions yourself in the task? Can you provide more complete error logs? Thanks.

@ruanwenjun Yes,  it's a must-see. I'm just using the traceback.print_exc() method to output exceptions in my program. This is my own log information：

There may be such an extreme situation that five servers received the message that one server was down, two of them added an alert, and one of them added an alert successfully. At this time, the alert arrived at the time of rotation training, and the message was sent to update the status of the alert. The other three services added an alert later, and another one succeeded

@wangxj3 You are right, this does happen in two situations.
1. If the zookeeper latency is more than 5 seconds. At present, the interval for sending alerts in our rotation training is 5 seconds, if the fastest arriving event and the slowest arriving are delayed by more than 5 seconds, the alert will be sent repeatedly.
2. If the first event and the second are in two rotations and the second event arrived after the first event send.

Both of these situations can happen, but the probability may not be very high, because the server crash doesn't always happen. Do you have a better solution?

1. Shut down the cluster gracefully #5470

3. Yarn gets the task status through the URL. If Kerberos is enabled, the URL needs to support Kerberos
4. The alarm plug-in of dev branch needs to have an instruction. At present, there is only  (informal version)[https://note.youdao.com/ynoteshare1/index.html?id=e40e83a50bf338500872aedeb7ebfa4d&type=note]
5. The date function of complement function is ambiguous, which requires a document or optimization
6. Restful API supports SDK. By referring to the encapsulated SDK, you can remotely operate DS [create, execute workflow, etc.]
7. DataX visualization function extension. Support hive/ HDFS ha visualization configuration
-----------------
1. 优雅的停止服务,以便于升级获取停止服务 #5470
2. 任务执行完成/挂掉, 导致任务实例或者任务状态一直处于执行中(1.3.6已经修复 ?)
3. Yarn 通过 的url 获取任务状态 , 如果开启Kerberos , 该url需要支持kerberos
4. Dev分支的告警插件需要有一份使用说明.目前只有 (非正式版本)[https://note.youdao.com/ynoteshare1/index.html?id=e40e83a50bf338500872aedeb7ebfa4d&type=note]
5. 补数功能的日期函数有歧义,这个需要出一份文档或者进行优化
6. Restful api 支持SDK, 项目通过引用封装好的jar包,就可以远程操作DS[创建,执行工作流等操作.]
7. DataX可视化功能扩展. 支持Hive/ hdfs HA 可视化配置.
